unnormalised: Campus hiring is crucial for fresh talent. Our team at Tata Consultancy Services has seen great success recruiting from IIT Delhi & IIM Ahmedabad. We'll be at NIT Trichy on 26/07/2024, 10:00 hrs. This year, we're focusing on AI & ML profiles. Looking forward to connecting with bright minds, offering packages starting at Rs. 8 LPA. Registrations close 15/07/2024! Expect interviews to wrap by 30/07/2024, 17:00 hrs. Best of luck to all applicants!
